verses.name: Galatians 4:11
verses.text: I am afraid of you, lest I have bestowed upon you labour in vain.

verses.name: Galatians 4:12
verses.text: Brethren, I beseech you, be as I am; for I am as ye are: ye have not injured me at all.

verses.name: Galatians 4:13
verses.text: Ye know how through infirmity of the flesh I preached the gospel unto you at the first.

verses.name: Galatians 4:14
verses.text: And my temptation which was in my flesh ye despised not, nor rejected; but received me as an angel of God, even as Christ Jesus.
